lead_paragraph: Sami Lepisto’s overtime goal led Finland to a 3-2 victory over the United States in the world hockey quarterfinals in Halifax, Nova Scotia. Finland advanced to play Russia in the semifinals Friday at Quebec. Canada will play Sweden in the other semifinal.
